q_en: What are the cutting tasks assigned to Precision Cutters?
gt:
Hello there! üòÑ Let's take a look at the cutting tasks assigned to the "Precision Cutters" working group. Here's what I found:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 18      | March 11, 2024      | April 7, 2024       | 200            | 200              | Completed ‚úÖ |
| 30      | April 19, 2024      | April 26, 2024      | 195            | 195              | Completed ‚úÖ |

It looks like the "Precision Cutters" have been busy and efficient, completing all their tasks on time! Keep up the great work! üéâ

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Precision Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group named "Precision Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT id, start_time, end_time, order_product_id, planned_number, completed_number, status FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks assigned to the working group "Precision Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT op.id, o.order_name, p.attributes, pt.description FROM order_product op JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE op.id IN (18, 30);
steps.description: Replace the order_product_id with the corresponding product details

steps.operation: Combine the results from Step2 and Step3 to display the cutting tasks along with the product details such as order name, product attributes, and product type description.
steps.results:
To achieve the objective, we need to combine the results from Step 2 and Step 3 to display the cutting tasks along with the product details. Here is the combined information:

1. **Cutting Task ID: 18**
   - **Order Name:** James_WinterOrder
   - **Product Attributes:** Brown, L size
   - **Product Type Description:** Jacket
   - **Start Time:** 2024-03-11
   - **End Time:** 2024-04-07
   - **Planned Number:** 200
   - **Completed Number:** 200
   - **Status:** 1

2. **Cutting Task ID: 30**
   - **Order Name:** William_Skirt_Sweater_Shorts
   - **Product Attributes:** Red, L size
   - **Product Type Description:** Shorts
   - **Start Time:** 2024-04-19
   - **End Time:** 2024-04-26
   - **Planned Number:** 195
   - **Completed Number:** 195
   - **Status:** 1

This combines the cutting task details with the corresponding product information for each task.

response:

|-----------------|---------------------------------|--------------------|--------------------------|-------------|-------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 18              | James_WinterOrder               | Brown, L size      | Jacket                   | 2024-03-11  | 2024-04-07  | 200            | 200              | 1      |
| 30              | William_Skirt_Sweater_Shorts    | Red, L size        | Shorts                   | 2024-04-19  | 2024-04-26  | 195            | 195              | 1      |

These tasks are all set and completed, showing the precision and efficiency of the "Precision Cutters" team! üéâ If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!
